text: Lary Evrard Yannick (born 10 December 1982), known as Lary, is a former Gabonese footballer who played as a forward. ==International career== Lary made his debut on 7 September 2002 in a 1–0 African Cup of Nations qualifying loss against Morocco in Libreville. On 29 March 2003, Lary scored a brace for the national team in a 4–0 victory over Equatorial Guinea at Stade d'Angondjé in Libreville. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Gabon's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable" |- ! # !!
